treeandmenu-desc: Adds #tree and #menu parser functions which contain bullet-lists to be rendered as collapsible treeviews or dropdown menus. The treeviews use the [http://wwwendt.de/tech/fancytree FancyTree] JavaScript tree menu, and the dropdown menus use [http://www.htmldog.com/articles/suckerfish/dropdowns/ Son of Suckerfish]
